Posts.Content: Beth, so happy you are done with radiation!  I can't wait to be there someday!  I read about this pink bus on here and I think it is great!  I'll be coming too.  I take it we are suppose to bring something, so, how about if I bake some cookies?  Sugar cookies and chocolate chips? Kathy
